Description:
DO NOT THINK TWICE, BUY WELL FOR THE FUTURE, WILL NOT LAST!
No. 9 is affordable, well maintained and in a quiet location, this is an excellent buy for the astute buyer. A wide entrance , generous lounge room as well as a second living combining kitchen, meals and some sitting space all opening to undercover patio space, this overlooks leafy and matured garden. Three bedrooms, master large with WIR, two more both have BIR'S. Central big 2 way bathroom, separat toilet and laundry. Features include gas heater, fans, good storage and pantry. Single garage with tendam access to backyard, room for more vehicles. Do not hesitate this is a gem for the first time buy , downsizer or invest for the future.
Insights: 9 Amarina Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 164 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Tell Him He's Dreamin!
Make no mistake, this is no dream! A beautifully presented 3 bedroom home, freshly painted, new carpets, x2 living areas on a 600m2+ land holding… all for under $500,000!!
• 3 generous bedrooms; a light and bright master suite is complete with dual walk in robes, ceiling fan and a walk through bathroom. Bedrooms 2 and 3 both have built in robes
• A modernised and light filled kitchen/family/meals zone is beautifully orientated to take in views of the picturesque rear gardens. A glass sliding door creates a seamless connection to a sheltered alfresco; a wonderful space for those who love to entertain
• The kitchen serves up a practical zone; expansive bench tops and excellent storage solutions further endorse its user friendly nature
• A lovely feature of this fine home is a 2nd independent living zone; independent access and split system heating/cooling creates a space suitable for a home office / business
• A home complete with all the modern comforts, gas ducted heating and split system cooling presents a genuine 'turn the key and start enjoying from day 1' option
• A double carport and additional off street parking provide room enough for the cars, boat and/or the jet ski
• This property simply ticks all the boxes and looks 'on the money'; a great home for today 'or' a great addition to any property portfolio

Description:
GREAT ALLOTMENT, COURT LOCATION - 602m2
This generously sized vacant allotment in a quiet court is now being offered for sale. The purchaser of this block will be able to build their dream home immediately- no restrictive covenants and fully titled. All services are available. This allotment is situated in an established area and is handy to transport, shopping and only a 20 minute commute to Geelong. The Bellarine Peninsula is a wonderful location to live with a fantastic lifestyle on offer for the whole family. Wineries, schools, dining options, medical facilities- it's all here. Titled land continues to sell quickly so call today for more information.

Address: 14 Water Vistas Court Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Expressions of Interest before 28/1/2019.......
This home is set within undoubtedly one of Clifton Springs' most exclusive cul de sacs, boasting exceptional panoramic bay vistas and a build of absolute excellence. It offers a truly executive lifestyle on the Bellarine Peninsula which ensures this property possesses an x-factor rarely seen in the local real estate market.
The Facts:
- Breathtaking panoramic water views of Corio Bay, the dazzling lights of Geelong and the impressive peaks of the You Yang Ranges.
- An exceptional build of no compromise that offers a beautiful free flowing floor plan boasting 4 bedrooms and 3 independent living areas.
- The kitchen serves up a sleek stylish design that complements a user friendly space for the 'chef' of the house; expansive dual stone bench tops, 900mm electric induction cooking, an oven complete with a built in rotisserie, excellent storage solutions and a walk-in-pantry.
- Four generous bedrooms: the master offers: glorious water views, a well appointed ensuite with his and her vanity, a luxury shower feature and a walk in robe that has to be seen to be believed.
- A parents retreat adjacent to the master offers a lovely relaxed living zone; glass sliding doors provide a seamless connection to a well-appointed resort-style balcony which captures some of most impressive water views in 3222.
- Landscaped gardens with an emphasis on low maintenance and water conservation ensure a striking aesthetic appeal without any of the on-going hard work.
- All the modern comforts, including ducted heating, split-system cooling and countless other features to be discovered upon inspection.
A wonderfully impressive home for today and an equally impressive investment for the future.
Insights: 14 Water Vistas Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 33 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
BAY SHORE IS SURE GOLD!
Set right in the heart of the Clifton Springs 'Golden Triangle' this 'rare as hens teeth' entry-level residence is sure to be 'hot property' from day one! Conveniently positioned to embrace a wonderful Bellarine lifestyle; the waters edge is only a short stroll away. The Clifton Springs Boat Ramp is literally just down the road and, believe it or not, you could even hit a 9 iron from your front yard and land on the 6th hole of the picturesque Clifton Springs Golf Club.
• A solid 3 bedroom home set on an enviable prime landing of approximately 766m2
• A double carport is complemented by a powered workshop/garage which also has provision for a car mechanics pit
• A fully fenced allotment boasts beautifully established gardens; the frontage is flanked with a feature brick/timber fenceline and the rear boundary overlooks a council reserve and provides a neighbourless feel
• All 3 bedrooms have built-in storage and excellent storage solutions are a consistent theme throughout this property
• A lovely feature of this home is an expansive sunken lounge while a glass sliding door creates a seamless connection to a rear courtyard
• The central bathroom is spacious and has been updated
• The kitchen has been well maintained and is complete with dishwasher, gas cook-top and electric wall-oven
• An elevated rear deck is a great place to take in an early coffee or an evening glass of your favourite local wine
• This property offers a great first home option or an excellent addition to your property portfolio; an A+ long term tenant has indicated her openness to stay longer term
• Securely leased until late January 2019 at $320 pw
Insights: 33 Bay Shore Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 41 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
AFFORDABLE ENTRY LEVEL HOME
Impressive in size is this fantastic single level family home offering the ultimate in low maintenance living and situated in a convenient location of Clifton Springs. A rare opportunity exists for the first home buyers, retirees or those looking to secure an excellent investment property. The fantastic floor plan boasts 3 bedrooms (all with overhead ceiling fans), master bedroom has en-suite and WIR, while the remaining 2 generous size bedrooms have a BIRobes. A spacious open plan living, dining and kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops, Chef cooktop, Bosch dishwasher and walk in pantry. Sliding doors lead you out to an excellent undercover decked entertaining area which complete this home. Other features of this impressive home include side double gate access, suitable to store a boat or caravan, floating floor boards, reverse cycle split system, ducted gas heating, remote single garage with internal access, water tank and a wired shipping container with power and lights. Positioned on an allotment of 585m2 (approx.) with low maintenance garden and located opposite the Clifton Springs Golf Course, just minutes to the secluded Dell Picnic Area and near the boat harbour. While there is a small collection of shops in Pinnaroo Avenue, major shopping facilities can be found in neighbouring Drysdale to the south and Curlewis to the West, secondary and primary schools. Don't waste any time as this home will not last, an inspection is sure to impress. If you are thinking of investing, retiring, buying your first home or just want a holiday location, then Clifton Springs is for you.
Insights: 41 Bay Shore Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Private Courtyard Unit
This low maintenance property that sits proudly on its own title and has a certain style. Well maintained and with a great floor plan this unit has indoor-outdoor living all covered and is the perfect transition property from a larger home.
On those sunny, autumn days the private courtyard is a sheltered, suntrap perfect for reading your favorite novel. When the sun is up, relax on the covered outdoor deck in the dappled shade of established trees. The manageable rear yard still allows plenty of room for a vegie patch.
Ready to move the furniture straight in. The floors have modern tiling and carpet, quality drapes throughout and outdoor blinds. The kitchen has plenty of cupboard space, pantry, a serving bench to the dining area and modern oven and range hood. Bedrooms are able to accommodate queen size beds and both have built in robes. The double linen press is located in the laundry. A single garage with remote door and storage cupboards complete this desirable unit property.
Contact agent for inspection at any time !

Description:
BIG AND BEAUTIFUL FAMILY HOME
The deceptively shy facade of this home belies its internal qualities. This immaculately presented and freshly painted home is big and beautiful on entry. Settled nicely into an established neighborhood with a quiet street frontage and regular public transport nearby.
Five bedrooms or 4 bed + study/home office, the interior living space leaves no-one stepping on each other's toes.
If you are looking for family space then this is the house for you !
The spacious main suite is located at the front of the home with a generous lounge area for parents to relax nearby. Three queen-sized bedrooms all with BIRs are located to the rear of the home adjacent to a fully renovated family bathroom and laundry.
Venture further and you find the true hub of this family home. An expansive, open and light-filled living-dining space able to accommodate a large, extended family gathering. Plenty of bench space, SS oven and DW and behind the closed doors the largest butler's pantry you could imagine. No need to ever have a mess on the kitchen bench again.
Entertain in style as the warmer, summer weather approaches. The fully-enclosed outdoor entertaining room has cafe blinds all around and is complete with pot belly stove. Decking of quality Merbau stretches back to the rear access from the double garage which incorporates ample shelving and work bench for the handyman.
The rear yard has room for the above ground pool, garden shed and sitting area. Added extras include approx 5KW solar panels
Insights: 4 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
HOLIDAY OR PERMANENT HOME? IT'S UP TO YOU
This newly listed home is currently enjoyed by a family who escape the big smoke and relax here on the Bellarine and why not? Thereâ??s plenty to do here for relaxation, eat out at the many cafe's restaurants and wineries. Ride bikes along the bike trail, enjoy a ride on the historic train from Drysdale to Queenscliff, go fishing, play golf or just sit at home and listen to the peace and quiet and more.Open plan with easy care timber floors throughout. Three bedrooms. Warm and cosy in winter, cool and relaxing in the summer. Nice shady backyard with a deck to sit back and enjoy each otherâ??s company whether you choose to live permanently or holiday in this home.
Every living amenity is here, supermarkets, schools, medical centres, sporting groups. A north facing bay where you can see many good sunsets or sunrises if you are an early riser.
Not only suitable for a holiday home, this would also offer anyone looking to relocate or invest here, the same benefits.

Description:
Pretty As A Picture!
This truly charming weatherboard residence oozes character and delivers a wonderful 'home' feel. Sitting peacefully within a quiet court location this fine property is sure to delight those seeking a tranquil 'sea change' experience; the convenience of the Pinnaroo Street shopping strip just a stone's throw away, neighbouring schools & parklands and the water's edge just a short stroll away further endorses the terrific lifestyle features of this home.
• Turn the key and take a big deep breath and say 'home sweet home'; upon entry you will be impressed by stunning polished timber floors, 2500mm ceiling height and crisp natural finishes.
• 3 oversized bedrooms, master suite complete with ensuite, walk in robe and additional built in robes. Bedrooms 2 and 3 both have built in robes
• The hub of this residence is a generously proportioned kitchen/family/meals zone; the kitchen is 'eye catching' and serves up a 'true blue' practical design possessing exceptional storage solutions, expansive bench tops and a brand new dishwasher and oven. A glass sliding door from the main living area creates a seamless connection to a custom built decked alfresco – a wonderful space to take in a morning coffee and gaze out over your private rear yard flanked by established trees.
• A 2nd living area provides further flexibility to what is already an adaptable floor plan; great use of windows right throughout promotes a light and bright 'feel'
• A stunning pathed courtyard in the front yard, beautiful cottage style gardens and dual timber gates secure the rear yard and create a family friendly 'home'
• Freshly painted, new carpets, polished floor boards, evaporative cooling, heating and all the modern comforts provide a walk in and enjoy from day 1 buying prospect. And when you thought it couldn't get any better – 5kw solar panel unit ensures you have an efficient home working for you.
• A great land holding of approximately 599m2, a quiet court location and a quality custom build ensure this property will be highly sought after.
Insights: 12 Kawana Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Coastal Charm!
If you desire a 'welcome home' feel with a WOW factor then look no further! As you approach this eye catching character filled residence you will be dazzled by spectacular panoramic views and an overwhelming sensation of 'I am so lucky'!!
• A striking street appeal creates an anticipation for a wonderful 'one of a kind' inspection! Big expansive windows; an impressive pitched roof line and charming feature shingles provide a warm and welcoming energy.
• Turn the key & step inside, you will be instantly impressed by a towering ceiling height which creates a lovely light-filled defined entry. Your inquisitive eye will be drawn upstairs; on further exploration you will discover a luxurious master bedroom suite of grand proportions – complete with panoramic bay views, modern ensuite, WIR & beautifully appointed study.
• The main living area is showcased by its great size, a consistent theme throughout this property. A contemporary gas log fire and ceiling fan provide heating/cooling to this vast room. A glass sliding door creates a seamless inside/outside connection to an elevated decked-alfresco for those who love to entertain; two heat panels further endorse its user friendly nature.
• A charming kitchen boasts an expansive timber bench, excellent storage solutions and functionality, gas cook-top, stainless-steel appliances and, by virtue of its orientation, a clear view of a family-friendly backyard.
• A second independent living area provides further flexibility to what is already a very adaptable floor plan – room enough for the growing family.
• 3 additional bedrooms are of generous proportions (all have built in robes) and are serviced by a family-sized bathroom.
• A double carport with drive through access and great scope to create additional vehicle accommodation (cars, boat, caravan and/or the jetski)
• Further impressive inclusions to be discovered on inspection.
A lovely surprise awaits you when you explore the enviable land holding of approximately 604m2. Set to the rear of the allotment is a timber studio/shed.
The A1 location of this property cannot be understated; positioned right on the fringe of the exclusive High Ridge Drive precinct, the Malcolm Reserve Playground is only a short stroll away and the bus literally passes your front door.
This property represents an opportunity to secure a wonderful home for today and an excellent investment for the future.
Insights: 58 Dandarriga Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
BIG BAY VIEWS , SOLAR PANELS , METICULOUSLY MAINTAINED AND UPDATED.
One of the best on the Bellarine Peninsula. Just sit back , enjoy the privacy, take in the You Yangs and the stunning bay views....sheer bliss! No. 50 has a large lounge area overlooking the bay with adjacent dining area and well designed and equipped kitchen with pantry, Bosch Double oven and quality appliances. The second living room opens out to the covered patio space and perfumed garden. Four bedrooms, one with ensuite, all have BIR'S, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features include gas log fire, split system air conditioning, 4 ceiling fans, loads of storage, and quality window furnishings. Double garage , extra storage under house and plenty of off road space for more vehicles .
A quiet area where the living is so easy.

Description:
Top Shelf!
It is very fitting that this fine property is positioned in one of Clifton Spring's most elevated pockets as it truly is 'top shelf' in every sense! Showcasing a stunning light & bright 'feel' this quality built residence will feel like home from the moment you turn the key.
• An attractive façade provides a hint to what is sure to be an outstanding inspection; stylish finishes are complemented by the unwavering brief to deliver a true 'lifestyle' home
• Upon entry you will be instantly impressed by grand proportions & towering exaggerated ceiling heights
• A central hub of this residence is a kitchen/family/meals zone which showcases great size & scale; crisp neutral finishes, expansive windows & an enviable orientation further enhance a wonderfully light & bright experience
• The kitchen serves up an eye catching design; expansive benchtops, custom high gloss cabinetry, feature tiled splash back, induction cooking, stainless steel appliances & a walk in pantry provides excellent storage solutions.
• 4 generous bedrooms; master is complete with a beautifully appointed ensuite & walk in robe. All additional bedrooms are equally generous & have BIRs.
• A 2nd independent living zone provides further flexibility to what is already an adaptable floor plan; a trio of floor to ceiling windows perfect frame landscaped gardens
• All the modern comforts; ducted gas heating, evaporative cooling & quality fixtures throughout ensure all year comfort (& boasts a 7 star rating)
• Dual glass sliding doors off the main living area create a seamless inside/outside living area. A fully equipped hardwood decked alfresco under the roofline creates a beautifully sheltered space for the 'entertainer'; an established hedge across the rear boundary provides a private setting.
• An impressive feature of this home & one of my personal favourites is the authentic Balinese hut; complete with a shingle roof, hardwood deck & a bench seat. It provides another space for the 'entertainer' with a WOW factor
• It's very difficult to find a property in today's local property market that nails the 'lifestyle' brief better; a double remote garage is complemented by an independent carport with side access (secured by dual timber gates & an exaggerated clearance of approximately 2.7m) further endorses a genuine one of a kind feature; room enough for the cars, boat, caravan & even the jet ski.

Address: 6 Bay Shore Ave Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Your own Oasis
Oozing the ultimate in coastal charm and in a highly sought after central pocket of Clifton Springs, put this split-level family home with its own separate self-contained unit at the very top of your list!
Situated upon a large 604m2 allotment and encompassing raked timber ceilings throughout, this home offers more than meets the eye. Mature Palm Tree's create a sense of privacy in the front garden, as well as that instant tropical feel. Upon entry, you're greeted by the light and bright open living and dining, equipped with split system, electric heater and stunning French doors that lead to the side garden. The fully equipped kitchen overlooks this area and comprises 5 burner gas cooktop, 900ml oven, dishwasher, built-in-pantry, ample cupboards and a feature window with garden outlook. The master bedroom with built-in-robes, spacious laundry and updated bathroom with lux floor to ceiling tiles, large feature vanity and separate bath/shower complete this level of the home.
Float upstairs where you're welcomed by a nifty study nook, 2 bedrooms with built-in-robes and modern central bathroom, all which feature the stunning exposed timber raked ceilings.
The true draw card is the separate self-contained unit on offer. Boasting a large bedroom/living area with split system, full-size kitchen and separate bathroom, this offers a wealth of opportunity for the large or growing family who require that extra privacy.
The established back garden offers that true tranquil feel and leads you to an expansive undercover area equipped with open fire, breakfast bar, separate raised deck and all while still offering enough room for the kids and all their toys! Complete with a single lock up garage with internal access, large garden shed and secure side access.
The location doesn't get much better than this! A short drive takes you to all amenities on offer - Supermarkets, schools, cafes and walking distance to the Clifton Springs Golf Club, The Dell and public transport quite literally being on your door step! A rare opportunity to secure a gorgeous family home, in a blue chip location and with Dual Occupancy doesn't present themselves very often - so don't wait!
Insights: 6 Bay Shore Ave, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect for the young or the young at heart
Nestled in a quiet avenue, this home creates a wonderful opportunity for first home buyers, retirees looking to downsize but still have a garden, or young families.
Upon entry to this solid two bedroom brick veneer home you are greeted with neutral tonings that create a warm and cosy ambiance.
The property features include a central galley style kitchen with ample prep and storage areas and electric appliances. Light filled spacious double bedrooms adorn the home with built in robes and a ceiling fan to the master.
This quaint home offers glimpses of the bay from the gorgeous low maintenance garden with ample room to move and relax if you choose.
With additional features such as a security system, slow combustion wood fire heater for those cold nights and being situated only minutes away from the Clifton Springs beach and boat ramp.

Description:
Fisherman's Haven!
Do you desire the ultimate 'sea change'? Literally from the front door step of this newly renovated character filled home you can smell the ocean and even see if the snapper is 'on the bite' from your arm chair. The water's edge is literally a short 500m stroll away presenting a wonderful lifestyle opportunity.
• Upon 'keyless' entry you will be instantly impressed by what is an absolute one-of-a-kind property; crisp white finishes complement classic design features.
• An open plan living area is bathed in natural light; a gas log fire sits proudly on a bed of slate and ensures a warm and welcoming experience.
• The fully renovated kitchen is eye catching and delivers functionality in spades; stainless-steel appliances, gas cook-top, chrome tap-fittings, pendant lighting, soft-close cabinetry, walk-in pantry and excellent storage solutions.
• 2 of the bedrooms occupy the upstairs loft and showcase towering raked-ceilings, while feature-windows frame glorious views of the bay and the impressive peaks of the You Yangs. An A-framed parents retreat creates a stunning independent living-zone and further flexibility to the floor plan. A 3rd bedroom on the ground floor is spacious and possesses a light and bright feel; dual glass doors create seamless connection to a wonderfully tranquil Balinese-themed hut. This bedroom has flexibility, to become the master with an entry to the bathroom.
• The custom-built outdoor entertaining zone is without doubt one of the finest in the property market; hardwood decking, a cedar-panelled feature wall, fish pond, feature lighting and established plantings create a true sense of being neighbour less.
• A true lifestyle property offering a double garage/work shop, user friendly off street parking for the boat and/or caravan and a low maintenance garden setting
• An A+ location places you close to schools, childcare, parklands and an array of shops including a doctors studio, convenience store, take away and even your very own local bottle shop.
• A genuine one of a kind property which is a must inspection; a great home for today and an excellent investment for the future.

Description:
Family Home or Investment Opportunity
Are you searching for a family home on a large block? Look no further! It's time for the owners of this much loved property to pass it on to the next family or budding investor to start their own memories.
Situated in a sought after location of Clifton Springs is this quality built home on approx. 760m2 of land. The charm of this four bedroom family home will give you that lifestyle opportunity that our amazing Bellarine offers and will be sure to impress from the moment you first enter.
Four spacious bedrooms, main with WIR and ensuite, while two others have BIRs. The open-plan kitchen and family living area spills out onto the large undercover deck (approx. 6m x 11m). A great space for relaxing or entertaining in the coming warmer months. The block offers a low-maintenance, private & secure backyard with plenty of space for the kids and pets to play.
Additional features include:
- Kids retreat/study area
- Gas ducted-heating
- Split system air-conditioner
- Gas boosted solar hot water
- Double garage with single roller access to rear yard.
This quality built home is within 3km of shops, schools, sporting clubs and the waterfront. This will make a fantastic family home or an excellent addition to your investment portfolio.
Currently tenanted at $420 per week with a fixed lease agreement until 17th May 2019.
Hurry this one won't last!!

Description:
Panoramic appeal with this easy-living contemporary home.
Basking in the "priceless view" category, this elevated, contemporary Clifton Springs home offers an enviable lifestyle on the beautiful Bellarine.
With upstairs accommodation of four bedrooms and two bathrooms (master with ensuite), an entertainment room, a laundry, and a fabulous, light-filled, open-plan lounge/kitchen/dining area that spills out onto an absolute cracker of a deck - life is very much on the laid-back side.
The user-friendly kitchen has an 900mm Omega electric oven and 5-burner gas cooktop, a Fisher and Paykel dish draw and a walk-in pantry. So meals can be a toss of the coin - indoors or out - your call.
Gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling take care of all seasons, and there's a double lock-up garage below, with extra storage under the house.
- Elevated contemporary home with panoramic bay views
- 4 bedrooms, (master with ensuite), 2nd bathroom, laundry
- Entertainment room, open-plan lounge/kitchen/dining
- Fabulous north/west facing deck - ideal outdoor dining
- Downstairs double garage and extra under-house storage
- Gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout.

Description:
Motivated To Sell
Quiet court location 3 bedroom brick veneer home with family friendly living. Formal lounge upon entry has bay windows. Walk around to central kitchen with an electric stove, dishwasher & air conditioner with an adjacent dining zone. Off the dining you have sliding doors both sides to either an undercover deck or to private sun room. Down the hall are bedrooms 2 & 3, one with built in shelving and the other has built in robes. Central laundry & bathroom. Further down is another smaller living area perfect for the parents retreat, 2nd living or kid's rumpus room. Master bedroom is enormous with garden views, 4 BIR's and full ensuite. Additional features gas ducted heating & ceiling fans throughout. Outside we have a carport at the end of a long driveway & 1.5 car garage perfect to set up as a man cave, work shop or store the bay toys such as your boat or Jet Ski. The yard also has lemon, 2 Apple & apricot trees on a fantastic block size of 676m2. Walking distance to the Dell & Clifton Springs golf club. Plus close to local schools, public transport, medical facilities, cafes & shopping centers plus all the award winning wineries.
Insights: 7 Boondi Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
DOWNSIZE TO BE CLOSE TO GOLF OR BOWLS
Looking to play a lot of Golf or Bowling and don't want too much to do at home? Well this unit might be the perfect downsizer for you to achieve your goal.
Or maybe you like the idea of buying an investment in an area where the prices have seen a great growth over the last 12 months of around 14.6% and you want to buy to be ahead of the future growth.
A short walk to the golf course or the bowling club means you can also fit in your exercise.
Never heard of Clifton Springs? A suburb that has taken a while to become known is now a suburb of choice for many offering all the amenities required for day to day living and playing.
Having lived here for over thirty years I have realised that even though it has grown it has not lost its historic appeal or peacefulness away from the hustle and bustle. You do not have to travel far to get groceries or visit the doctor or even ride your bike.
Insights: 1/6 Berrigan Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018.
